metadata.title: CVE-2021-37995 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in WebApp Installer in Google Chrome prior to95.0.4638.54 allowed a remote attacker to potentially overlay and spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
